ISSUE.TITLE: Do not allow to specify 0 as "Page Size" (categories, vendors, manufacturers). Only positive values
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Otherwise, exception will be thrown in public store - http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/44098/bugexception-when-you-put-page-size-to-0-for-category.aspx let's just ensure that it'll work fine when "Allow customers to select page size" is enable (hence "Page Size" field is hidden but still set to 0)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #1738 Do not allow to specify 0 as "Page Size" (categories, vendors, manufacturers). Otherwise, exception can be thrown in public store
